name: Fool's Errand (itch)
description:
On a strange world beset with hazard with no memory of your journey there, can you beseech the Gods to grant you escape? 

Use yonder controls to seek a way home:

Walk           -  W,A,S,D
Look           -  Mouse
Grab/Use L/R   -  Left Mouse / Right Mouse
Combine/Craft  -  Middle Mouse
Drop L/R       -  Q / E

Almost everything in this world has some use. Only exploration and experimentation can reveal an exit.

PRIZE:
The first person to post a screenshot of the win screen will get a special place in the next version of the game.
